title: Flu Vaccination Clinics
description: We offer flu shots for existing patients at several locations on the South Side and in the south suburbs.
cleaned_text: Protect Yourself and Others from the Flu Getting a flu shot, is the best way to lower the risk of influenza (the flu). The flu vaccine also lowers the risk of spreading the virus to family members, friends and people you work with. To protect yourself and others from getting the flu, it is best to get vaccinated in early fall before flu season begins. Flu Vaccination Clinic Locations and Hours The University of Chicago Medicine offers flu shots for adults and children at several convenient downtown, South Side and south suburban clinic locations.
